Description: Oliver Peoples Victory 55 Burn Notice Sunglasses Please Note: This is the release with lighter weight Cognac CR-39 Polarized Lenses that last sold at the Oliver Peoples Sunset boutique for $495. Not the newest release with the heavier VFX Glass Polarized Lenses. This pair is the closest you can get to the actual glasses worn on Burn Notice. They could not use glass lenses on the show for safety reasons. CONDITION: Frame is Excellent and very gently used. Lenses installed in the frame will show some scratching seen up close but too light to show up in the photos. Extra set of the same lenses included that are in excellent condition and haven't been used. SIZE 55 mm (lens width) - 17mm (bridge) -140mm (temple length). Please make sure this size fits before purchasing. NO RETURNS ACCEPTED. ALL SALES FINAL. SOLD AS IS. NO RETURNS FOR NOT FITTING SERIOUS BUYERS ONLY. Ask any questions you have before purchasing. This is a Final Sale. No Returns or Exchanges. Payment Expected Promptly. NONPAYING BUYERS WILL BE REPORTED AND THE ITEM WILL BE RE-LISTED International Buyers Please Note: Any customs fees or taxes are the responsibility of the buyer and are not included in this auction.
